Hi, there!

We failed to deliver your fax to ${FAXDESTNUM}. We will re-attempt to send this fax automatically and provide another status update shortly. Here are the details below:

Error: ${FAXERROR}

Status: ${FAXSTATUS}

Pages: ${PAGES}

Destination: ${FAXDESTNUM}

Your Fax DID: ${FAXSOURCENUM}

If you have any questions, feel free to email our customer success team ( support@voxo.co ). (We're lightning quick at replying.) We also offer live chat on our website.

Thanks,
From the VOXO Team
